Module mesakit.map.geography
Package com.telenav.mesakit.map.geography.shape.segment

Class Segment

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.mesakit.map.geography.shape.segment.Segment
All Implemented Interfaces:
LocationSequence, Bounded, Intersectable, Headed, Serializable
public class Segment extends Object implements Bounded, Intersectable, Headed, Serializable, LocationSequence
Class representing a line connecting two Location objects and providing some utilities around their relationship.
Author:
ericg, matthieun
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • intersects

      public boolean intersects​(Rectangle rectangle)
      Determines intersection using an adaptation of Liang-Barsky clipping.
      Specified by:
      intersects in interface Intersectable
      Returns:
      True if this object intersects or is completely contained by the given rectangle, false if the object lies outside the rectangle and does not intersect it.
      See Also:
      "http://www.skytopia.com/project/articles/compsci/clipping.html"

    • intersects

      public boolean intersects​(Segment that)
      NOTE: This method is only useful on short segments as it does not take into account the curvature of the earth.
      Returns:
      True if this segment intersects that segment.

    • parallel

      public Segment parallel​(boolean left, Distance offset)
      Parameters:
      left - if true, otherwise right
      offset - the distance from the new created segment to this segment
      Returns:
      a new created segment that is parallel to this segment with distance of offset and on the left or right

    • perpendicular

      public Segment perpendicular​(Location at, Distance length)
      Returns:
      A segment perpendicular to this segment at the given location of the given length on both sides of this segment.
